alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Wakulla County through 345 PM EDT... At 315 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crawfordville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crawfordville, Sopchoppy, Shadeville, Medart, Wakulla Beach, Buckhorn, Hyde Park, Wakulla Springs, Arran and Tully. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
